title: Server down?
body: I don't know if I haven't been reading anything lately or if riot has shut down the server for short/long maintenance. But I can't connect to the oce server is something happening going on? Like an update? It keep saying "Starting Authenication Process. Waiting for server" it just says that then it goes to "attempts" I've checked the service status everything seems to be working but I can't log in.

replies.body: IS THERE ANYTHING WRONG? ITS BEEN ABOUT 3 HOURS NOW IT STILL WON'T LET ME RECONNECT %%%% LIKE THIS PISSES MEE OFF I JUST WANNA PLAY TEH GAMEEEE. HAS GOT ANYTHING TO DO WITH MY INTERNET? CAUSE ITS WORKING PERFECTLY FINEEE.
